name: NestJS Prisma Starter
description: NestJS Server with Prisma integration and JWT Passwort authentication

JWT_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed JWT.

JWT_EXPIRES_IN.description: Expiration time of the JWT token expressed in milliseconds or a string describing a time span https://github.com/zeit/ms.js.

PASSWORD_SALT_OR_ROUNDS.description: The salt to be used in encryption for the password.

PRISMA_SECRET.description: A service secret to protect your Prisma Api.
